Title: MDS - URL Variables and authentication flow
Preconditions:
GIVEN an MDS module is configured on a surface
AND it is within the set date range to display
AND the MDS feature flag is on
AND site data has been cleared for mlb.com for chrome/safari on the device
Steps Separated:
1. WHEN a URL of the following form is configured:
mlbatbat://tapstory?url=https://www.mlb.com/stories/{OKTAID}/my/{DATE}

Expected Result:
THEN it should direct to the following with no SSO flow
Example:
https://www.mlb.com/stories/00u2r8zesehnpld08357/my/2025-04-10
2. WHEN a URL of the following form is configured:
mlbatbat://tapstory?url=https://www.mlb.com/stories/{OKTAID}/my?appView=true
Expected Result:
THEN it should should direct to the following with no SSO flow
Example:
https://www.mlb.com/stories/00u2r8zesehnpld08357/my
Note the current backend behavior triggers authentication (bad experience) but this is known
3. WHEN a URL of the following form is configured:
mlbatbat://tapstory?authenticate=true&url=https://www.mlb.com/stories/my/

Expected Result:
THEN it should should  use the SSO flow
Steps Separated (Expected Result):
1. THEN it should direct to the following with no SSO flow
Example:
https://www.mlb.com/stories/00u2r8zesehnpld08357/my/2025-04-10
2. THEN it should should direct to the following with no SSO flow
Example:
https://www.mlb.com/stories/00u2r8zesehnpld08357/my
Note the current backend behavior triggers authentication (bad experience) but this is known
3. THEN it should should  use the SSO flow
Steps Separated (Step):
1. WHEN a URL of the following form is configured:
mlbatbat://tapstory?url=https://www.mlb.com/stories/{OKTAID}/my/{DATE}

2. WHEN a URL of the following form is configured:
mlbatbat://tapstory?url=https://www.mlb.com/stories/{OKTAID}/my?appView=true
3. WHEN a URL of the following form is configured:
mlbatbat://tapstory?authenticate=true&url=https://www.mlb.com/stories/my/

Title: MDS - slug and limit query params
Expected Result:
THEN the "slug":"my-daily-story" and "limit":40 query params will be sent
AND the limit will limit the records returned to the set value
AND the slug will be appended to each of the team ids/names returned ex. "t108-angels-my-daily-story"
Preconditions: GIVEN a MDS module is configured on a surface
Steps: WHEN the MyDailyStory midfield call is made

Title: SB - Adobe mlbapp-ja-language-support Activity
Steps Separated:
1. GIVEN the device language is set to Japanese
AND is part of the mlbapp-ja-language-support Adobe activity
AND the activity is returning "surfaceBuilder":true
WHEN the home surface is loaded
Expected Result:
THEN all calls to midfield that send a locale will send ?locale?: ?JA_JP?
AND all content taps will succeed including articles where ?/ja/? will be inserted in the URL path
2. GIVEN the device language is set to Spanish
AND is therefore NOT part of the mlbapp-ja-language-support Adobe activity
WHEN the home surface is loaded
Expected Result:
THEN all calls to midfield that send a locale will send ?locale?: ?ES_US?
AND all content taps will succeed including articles where ?/es/? will be inserted in the URL path
3. GIVEN the device language is set to any except Spanish or Japanese
AND is therefore NOT part of the mlbapp-ja-language-support Adobe activity
WHEN the home surface is loaded
Expected Result:
THEN all calls to midfield that send a locale will send ?locale?: ?EN_US?
AND all content taps will succeed
Steps Separated (Expected Result):
1. THEN all calls to midfield that send a locale will send ?locale?: ?JA_JP?
AND all content taps will succeed including articles where ?/ja/? will be inserted in the URL path
2. THEN all calls to midfield that send a locale will send ?locale?: ?ES_US?
AND all content taps will succeed including articles where ?/es/? will be inserted in the URL path
3. THEN all calls to midfield that send a locale will send ?locale?: ?EN_US?
AND all content taps will succeed
Steps Separated (Step):
1. GIVEN the device language is set to Japanese
AND is part of the mlbapp-ja-language-support Adobe activity
AND the activity is returning "surfaceBuilder":true
WHEN the home surface is loaded
2. GIVEN the device language is set to Spanish
AND is therefore NOT part of the mlbapp-ja-language-support Adobe activity
WHEN the home surface is loaded
3. GIVEN the device language is set to any except Spanish or Japanese
AND is therefore NOT part of the mlbapp-ja-language-support Adobe activity
WHEN the home surface is loaded
